channel.title: Photo Gallery on The Cliffs at Waterford Spring Lake, NC
channel.description: Recent content in Photo Gallery on The Cliffs at Waterford Spring Lake, NC

item.title: Photos
item.description: .Gallery{display:flex;flex-wrap:wrap;justify-content:center}.Gallery__Input{position:absolute;top:0;left:0;height:0;width:0;opacity:0;pointer-events:none}.Gallery__Label{display:block;line-height:1.1em;padding:.25em}.Gallery__Thumbnail{height:150px}.Gallery__Caption{text-align:center;font-weight:600}.Gallery__FullSize{position:fixed;top:0;bottom:0;left:0;right:0;display:none;align-items:center;justify-content:center;background-color:rgba(247,247,247,.8)}.Gallery input:checked~.Gallery__FullSize{display:flex}.Gallery__FullSize img{max-height:96vh;max-width:96vw}.Gallery__Previous,.Gallery__Next{position:fixed;top:0;bottom:0;left:0;right:0;display:flex;align-items:center;cursor:pointer}.Gallery__Previous{right:50%;justify-content:flex-start}.Gallery__Next{left:50%;justify-content:flex-end}.Gallery__Previous:before,.Gallery__Next:after{content:"";height:30px;width:30px;margin:2vh 2vw;border-bottom:2px solid #767676;border-left:2px solid #767676;-webkit-transition:border-color .2s linear;-moz-transition:border-color .2s linear;-ms-transition:border-color .2s linear;-o-transition:border-color .2s linear;transition:border-color .2s linear}.Gallery__Previous:hover:before,.Gallery__Next:hover:after{border-color:#151515}.Gallery__Previous:before{transform:rotate(45deg)}.Gallery__Next:after{transform:rotate(225deg)}.Gallery__Close{position:fixed;display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center;top:2vh;right:2vw;height:30px;width:30px;cursor:pointer}.Gallery__Close:before,.Gallery__Close:after{content:"";position:absolute;flex-shrink:0;height:2px;width:30px;background-color:#767676;-webkit-transition:background-color .2s linear;-moz-transition:background-color .2s linear;-ms-transition:background-color .2s linear;-o-transition:background-color .2s linear;transition:background-color .2s linear}.Gallery__Close:hover:before,.Gallery__Close:hover:after{background-color:#151515}.Gallery__Close:before{transform:rotate(45deg)}.Gallery__Close:after{transform:rotate(135deg)}.Gallery.MiniGallery .Gallery__Thumbnail{height:125px}.Gallery.MiniGallery .Gallery__Item{flex:1 0 26%;margin:0 .5em 1em}@media(max-width:950px){.Gallery.MiniGallery .Gallery__Item{flex-basis:51%}} document.
